Html:
The "UpdateServicesPackages" shared folder on my WSUS server doesn't seem to get cleaned up whenever I decline/expire and delete packages. I have old content in that folder that is no longer relevant and taking up space.

What is the proper method to cleanup unused content in that folder?
Hi, start WPP, connect to your Wsus server, right click on your server name and choose «Clean UpdateServicesPackages Folder…»

DCourtel wrote:
Hi, start WPP, connect to your Wsus server, right click on your server name and choose «Clean UpdateServicesPackages Folder…»
Thank you! I looked through all the menu options, but didn't think to right-click the WSUS server.
